tool_description: An API showing all the latest Football News around the world
name: Football News Live
title: Football News Live

api_list.name: Get All Football News
api_list.description: This endpoint return all  news about Football from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get individual news source
api_list.description:
It gets news about Football from the following specific news sources:
- bbc
- sun
- guardian
- es
- smh
- latimes
- dm
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
